basic.description: This course explores the microscopic anatomy and functions of the cells, tissues, and glands composing the organs and systems of humans.
basic.subject: ZOO
basic.title: Histology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, and CHM 1046L.
